Faq.question: How do I search for movies?
Faq.answer: To search for movies, simply enter the movie title in the search bar and click the search button. The app will return the top 5 results based on your query.

Faq.question: What information is provided about each movie?
Faq.answer: For each movie, the app displays the poster, title, release year, genre, director, actors, plot (full), and any awards the movie has won.

Faq.question: How are the featured movies chosen?
Faq.answer: The app highlights two predefined movies as featured. These featured movies are loaded when the app starts and provide a full overview of their details including poster, title, year, awards, and plot.

Faq.question: Can I view the full plot of a movie?
Faq.answer: Yes, for each movie you can view the full plot. If the plot is long, there may be a “Read more” option that will expand to show the entire plot.

Faq.question: Is this app mobile-friendly?
Faq.answer: Yes, the app is fully responsive and can be used on any device, including mobile phones and tablets.
